item.title: Everyday Minerals, a brand that is committed to being cruelty-free, has launched a new range of eyeshadows
item.description:
Everyday Minerals (EM) prioritizes using the purest natural ingredients to create all-natural, vegan, and cruelty-free makeup. Their products are handmade in Texas and packaged in eco-friendly, recyclable materials. Source: Everyday Minerals blog. Vegan makeup is characterized by its exclusion of animal-derived ingredients and its non-reliance on animal testing. Ingredients like lanolin and collagen are examples of animal-derived components. A growing number of cosmetics companies are introducing vegan product lines or, like EM, adopting a fully vegan approach...

item.title: Bourjois eyeshadows are available in matte, pearl, and shimmer finishes
item.description:
Launched in 1912, Bourjois makeup is recognized for its signature small round compacts. The brand’s newest eyeshadows come in these iconic compacts and are offered in a range of matte, pearl, and shimmer finishes. The eight new eyeshadows glide onto eyelids smoothly when applied dry. If applied damp, the eyeshadows can be used to create precise lines, similar to eyeliner. 01 INGENUDE This shade is a delicate, slightly pearly off-white. It can be used to even out the look of eyelids...
